channel.title: All stats Bug in Easyrsc[no one can fix this]
channel.description:
when you log on a character, then log out and back in, drop a item and attack a npc and when you attack them hit the x in the corner to close client, when you logg back in you can click on your prayers and they do not drain, hits dont go up if they are low--- stat drain/restore events dont get started.
What causes this?

item.title: All stats Bug in Easyrsc[no one can fix this]
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

i know someone out there can fix this or help me out… and when they do i appreciate it.

Read full topic

item.title: All stats Bug in Easyrsc[no one can fix this]
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:7, topic:477829”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=596024.msg4198274#msg4198274 date=1357839920]
It seems like there are 2 instances of the same player. You should not allow them to log in until the other one is out of combat.

Also, you can completely avoid this issue by using a source that doesn’t suck…
[/quote]
how would i see if this is the case?[/quote]I’m not going to waste my time trying to figure it out… You shouldn’t either.

Read full topic

It seems like there are 2 instances of the same player. You should not allow them to log in until the other one is out of combat.

Also, you can completely avoid this issue by using a source that doesn’t suck…
